Uses of Class
org.apache.datasketches.hll.TgtHllType

  • Packages that use TgtHllType 
    Package Description
    org.apache.datasketches.hll
    The DataSketches™ HLL sketch family package HllSketch and Union are the public facing classes of this high performance implementation of Phillipe Flajolet's HyperLogLog algorithm[1] but with significantly improved error behavior and important features that can be essential for large production systems that must handle massive data.

    • Uses of TgtHllType in org.apache.datasketches.hll

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static TgtHllType HllSketch.DEFAULT_HLL_TYPE
      The default HLL-TYPE is HLL_4
